comment.body:
> [erkan](#comment_1_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): Welcome to zeronet :-) Hope you are doing fine. Erkan http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroBlog.bit

Thanks!
Updating this site is taking me outside my comfort zone as a web developer, I love that.

> [erkan](#comment_3_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): @neat did something go wrong on your site? I am seeing since 20-30 mins in my blog feed some html tags from you, like: (1). Or is this on purpose?  (1) <marquee width=' 200px'>Oh, neat. The nerd blog.</marquee>

I was testing the head form. Site.title parses html on the page, whereas ZeroHello it'll plaintext instead of strip. Best practice I guess would be to wrap /html/body/div[3]/h1/a[2] instead of scaring everyone (like I just did) with inappropriately placed html. Sorry about that :P

> [erkan](#comment_6_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): bush, as in George Bush? ;-)

If you were playing hide and seek, where's the last place on earth someone would check? George's bush! ZING!

> [erkan](#comment_7_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): pic on left: who is the one holding you in his arms? :-)

My adorable baby Blake :D
8months

> [neat](#comment_6_165pvC7rfviuUEKgLUm8XDHpQGH6xZZ8VQ): My adorable baby Blake :D8months

OOH I see I see lol
